simple-review.description: Soulive is one of the great jam bands. They’re almost impossible to capture well on CD, but this disc comes the closest. I don’t really know what to call it: acid jazz, or just jazz, or trip-jazz, or something. It’s basically just a really good flow. And there’s no singing (except for some guest vocals on a couple of tracks). Not necessarily good or bad, just different. I probably would have given this disc 5 / 5, but part of the reason for the post is showing off the “stars”, and I wanted to demonstrate an empty one too.
